education.institution: FAST-National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences

experience_and_trainings.title: Data Science Trainee
description: Gained hands-on experience with Python libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and OpenCV for data analysis and computer vision tasks
Worked on web scraping and explored Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques for enhanced data extraction and retrieval

experience_and_trainings.title: Artificial Intelligence (Machine Learning and Deep Learning)
experience_and_trainings.organization: National Vocational and Technical Training Commission (NAVTTC)
description: Gained hands-on experience in machine learning, model design, and evaluation
Specialized in NLP using TensorFlow, including text preprocessing and deep learning
Worked with advanced techniques like word embeddings and NLP pipelines

projects.name: Advanced Clickstream Data Analytics
description: Developed a campaign performance tool using Next.js and LangChain’s vector DB for clickstream analysis
Integrated LSTM/BiLSTM models to analyze user behavior patterns
Applied encoding techniques and Agentic AI to process large-scale clickstream data

projects.name: E-Commerce Store
description: Built a full-stack platform with user authentication, product catalog, and secure Stripe checkout
Integrated Redis for session management and real-time admin dashboard
Implemented sales analytics and inventory tracking for admin control

projects.name: ConnectDevs– Developer Networking Platform
description: Created a developer-focused networking platform with profile creation and connection requests
Designed interactive UI using React for seamless user experience
Enabled professional network management with scalable backend logic

projects.name: Fact Learn– Educational Web App
description: Developed a fact-sharing web application using modular React components
Deployed application using Netlify with responsive UI

projects.name: O Social– Console-Based Social Media App
description: Implemented OOP principles including inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation, and abstraction
Built features such as friend requests, posts, and event sharing in a console-based environment

projects.name: Ping Pong– 2D Game

Applied programming fundamentals: loops, conditionals, and function pointers
